cz.cvut.fel.matyapav.afandroid.components.parts

Class CustomAdapterView

  • java.lang.Object
    • LinearLayout
      • cz.cvut.fel.matyapav.afandroid.components.parts.CustomAdapterView

  • public class CustomAdapterView
extends LinearLayout
    This class defines look of custom list items.
    Since:
    1.0.0.

    • Method Detail

      • createListItem

        private void createListItem(Context context,
                            int position,
                            LinearLayout layout,
                            int setOfFieldsOrientation)
        Creates UI on one list item on specified position.
        Parameters:
        context - needed to create UI dynamically
        position - position of item which UI is being created
        layout - layout to which will be UI added
        setOfFieldsOrientation - orientation of fields within one list item.

      • prepateListNameView

        private TextView prepateListNameView()
        Prepares list item name, which has different look from other information in list item.
        Returns:
        list item name view

      • prepareListTextView

        private TextView prepareListTextView()
        Prepares list item text. With this text view are represented all information except the first one.
        Returns:
        list item text view

      • prepareLayout

        private LinearLayout prepareLayout()
        Prepares layout of list item which will be all information add to.
        Returns:
        layout of list item
